name: DEATH METAL
description:
# ABOUT

This is a jam game done in 10 days for Dogpit Jam 2018.

# STORY

The year is A.D. 2098.

You were a lone wanderer on the barren wastelands of America, until you found DEATH METAL, the workshop in the desert and the village near it. You made there your home.

But now mutant cultists are coming to claim everything you and your fellow survivors built. 

They will approach the workshop from the north side. You must prevent them from nearing the workshop, while keeping yourself alive, with your trusty workshop crafted war machine: pre-war vehicles armed with various deadly components.

You know this is probably the end for you. But you will take as many as the filthy cultists with you.

# CONTROLS

The only controls you need to know: mouse clicks and arrow keys.
